attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The only thing the average person has in common is moaning about the state our country has got in to this is because over taxation has crippled the nation.I feel i work for nothing but to pay tax its costs me 250 pound in petrol just to get work a month then theres council tax and all the hidden vat on all we purchase.I used to be proud of my country but feel the goverment is out of touch with the common people we dont even have a national holiday for our patron saint as they do in wales and scotland.I feel us being in the EU is a big game of simple simon says and we always come worse off.iI feel this survey will give the powers that be some food for thought that no goverment think tank could.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
